name: Boolean Circuit
description:
You star as two little characters who can not function without a connection.
The object of the game is to stay Connected and solve the puzzle.
Each character is operated with one button.

play both characters yourself or play with a friend. 

A prototype built for the godot wild jam #21

Built on Godot version 3.2.1.

Github: https://github.com/jacobabarbary/BooleanCircuit

Authors: opsaaaaa, jacobabarbary
